@ Tomy225 - I installed the game, and it is working for me without any problems (only thing that I didn't found solution for is resolution).Anyway, try to install those things manually. Navigate to folder where you installed the game and then go to folder name Redist. Open that folder and install everything expect UbisoftGameLauncher. Hope that helped

@ sabatokian - well I passed the game without any problems and I never saw any graphic glitches. Did you installed latest direct x and GPU driver, maybe that can solve the problem. What is your rig btw?
@ MoD323 - i'm sure i have the latest direct x, gpu driver i updated a few months ago... my rig - 4Gb memory, intel dual core 2Ghz, ATI radeon Hd 4300 series. maybe too slow?

Very good torrent, works perfectly but I got 2 problems : I can't change the controls (I have to swap AZERTY from QWERTY, well not a problem) et you say that it's a multi8 languages but I don't see how you can change it to french or spanish as there are only deutsch or english as languages for the installation.
the graphic spiky thing is a web frame/ directX problem either overall or just in game install.....have not play this yet but thats normally the problem

@ maxis1 - ok, thanks, now i know at least where is the problem, but how do i solve it?
i updated the directx, drivers for gpu and reinstalled the game, but it didn't get any better

@ sabatokian - you got Ati 4xxx series, I got 4870, if you got 12.6 driver (latest for now) well that driver is nothing but trouble, I had it and it performed terrible to me so I rollbacked to 12.4 and I got my old good performance back, I don't know maybe just I had that problem but I don't know for sure. My advice is to rollback or wait for a new driver with fixes and stuff, but I don't want to stay on 4xxx series anymore I am looking for upgrade anyway.
